method.name: swtDefaults
method.description: Creates a GridLayoutFactory that creates GridLayouts with the default SWT values.

method.name: fillDefaults
method.description: Creates a GridLayoutFactory that creates GridLayouts with no margins and default dialog spacing.

method.name: copy
method.description: Creates a copy of the reciever.

method.name: createFrom
method.description: Creates a factory that creates copies of the given layout.

method.name: create
method.description: Creates a new GridLayout, and initializes it with values from the factory.
